title: Время завтрака
overview: While you are deciding what to eat for breakfast - an omelette or a bun - the stars are already frying, steaming and sharing the secrets of their morning habits. In the studio of the show "Breakfast Time", Anton and Kamilla Dmitriev together with guests cook their favorite dishes, discuss life, habits and most importantly - why salt in porridge. This is not just cooking, but a whole culinary magazine with inspiration for the whole day. Start your morning deliciously - and with a smile.
